cab.content:
(This Document is the Property of His Britannic Majesty's Government.)
SECRET.
G.T.5975
BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 14th OCTOBER, 1918.
1. WESTERN FRONT.
On the YPRES battle front the line is reported to run WERVICQ (inclusive), thence along the ?ENIN road to 1,000 yards north-west of MENIN, WIJNBERG, about 2,000 yards east of MOORSEELE, WINKEL ST. ELOI (inclusive), BOSCH-MOELENS, thence to RUMBEKE (doubtful), east of ROULERS to BEVEREN, GITSBERG (inclusive) GITS (exclusive) CORTEMARCK STATION (inclusive), HANDSAENE (inclusive).
The British have taken over 1,000 prisoners and the French and Belgians over 3,000. Also several guns have been captured.
French Front.
West of GRAND PRE the French have taken MOURON and have advanced the line to OLIZY.
North of LAON the French have captured AULNOIS, also CHERY. Otherwise there is nothing to report.
BALKAN FRONT.
In SERBIA the Serbians now hold points north of NISH while to the west they hold the line MRANOR - PROKOUPLYE.
French cavalry have occupied BELA and PALANKA, between NISH and PIROT.
ITALIAN AND PALESTINE FRONTS.
There is nothing to report.
General Staff,
War Office, S.W.1.
14th October, 1918.
Issued at 19.00.
